3.0.0-exp.1.name: com.unity.ugui
3.0.0-exp.1.description: Unity UI is a set of tools for developing user interfaces for games and applications. It is a GameObject-based UI system that uses Components and the Game View to arrange, position, and style user interfaces. ​ You cannot use Unity UI to create or change user interfaces in the Unity Editor.

_upm.changelog: Added asset migration to TextCore, enabling the use of the same assets between UI Toolkit and UGUI.

name: com.unity.ugui
description: Unity UI is a set of tools for developing user interfaces for games and applications.
